DATA

This is tha page of Data Template

    安装
    npm install webpack ejs-compiled-loader string-loader --save-dev
    配置文件
    ...
    module: {
        loaders: [
            {
                test: /\.ejs$/,
                loader: 'ejs-compiled-loader'
            },
            {
                test: /\.tpl$/,
                loader: 'string'
            }
        ],
        noParse: [/ejs.min.js/]
    },
    resolve: {
        alias: {
            'ejs': './lib/ejs.min.js'
        }
    }
    ...
